title: Person of Interest - Samaritan UI
author: snatchingsouls
comment: Yeah, fantastic job on the UI. So much more clinical than 'The Machine' - the designers did an amazing job. This season may have been the best so far, they keep improving the quality on a show which was already pretty good to begin with. Looking forward to what comes next....
Love this show so much! Would love it to get like 'watchdogs' game where they interact with the environment down the line. Great vid! Love the Samaritan UI! If only i could get this for my mac.lol
It's like linux nerd gone on killing rampage.
I love the alien feel Samaritan has. Well done, those involved!
Can someone make me a phone theme that is like Samaritan?
